title: The Mystery of Thomas Thormes
description: A young boy on Seattle's First Avenue uncovers an important forbidden secret , related to the family's rich and forgotten past.That magical secret will literally change his way of seeing things, allowing him to obtain inaccessible desires and achieve the dream of a the construction of an imposing World Famous Bank.All that glitters is not gold ... his discovery will cost him dearly.Strange events do not seem to give him respite.His future appears marked by an ancient curse ...
author: Davide Deidda
